Detailed Description

An Averager that projects a given state onto the state subspace obtained by ignoring certain state dimensions.

Since each Average only uses a single basis state, this approximation corresponds exactly to state abstraction. Each Average object created by this averager returns a value for basis_weights() that has exactly one basis with weight 1.0.

const StateVariables & ProjectionAverager::dimensions (  )  const [virtual]

Specifies the importance of each state dimension to this Averager.

Returns:
A mapping whose keys comprise all the state dimensions that this Averager uses in its approximation. The data give the scaling coefficient for each of these dimensions.

Implements Averager.
